entry.title: Tree-chains preliminary summary
entry.summary: A Bitcore developer has commented negatively on Peter Todd's attitude towards Bitcoin, saying that it turns off other developers from participating more interactively. Jeff Garzik, a Bitcoin core developer, suggests that this is not an uncommon issue in open source projects and that it was something he saw during his 15+ years working in the Linux kernel community. Garzik proposes introducing an openly stated moderation policy for the list to tackle this issue.
